main event: On 6 December 1954, multiple sightings of unusual aerial objects were reported in Edinten, North Carolina.
interesting points: Witnesses reported a bright white object hovering before climbing straight up and disappearing., One reported object was described as oval-shaped with an estimated size of 20-25 feet long and 7-10 feet wide., Observations lasted from 5 minutes to 20 seconds depending on the sighting., Witness Gerald Cromer described an object moving in an undulating motion., The report concluded some sightings might be explained as aircraft or distant celestial bodies.
witness description: residents of Edinten, believed to be reliable individuals with no prior interest in UFOs
